CustomSetting.Name: Enable Single Sign On
CustomSetting.Description: Enables SSO for the workstation.

CustomSetting.Name: Circular Logging
CustomSetting.Description: If this setting is turned on, circular logging will be enabled at all times, dumping log files into %LOCALAPPDATA%\DataNowLogs whenever an error is detected.

CustomSetting.Name: Auto Throttle Minimum
CustomSetting.Description: This represents a minimum limit below which we won't throttle DataNow's connection. Value in KBps.

CustomSetting.Name: Auto Throttle Percentage
CustomSetting.Description: This sets the percentage of the estimated upload pipe that DataNow will allow it self to use. Value as a %.

CustomSetting.Name: Auto Throttle Retest Interval
CustomSetting.Description: This sets how often DataNow will retest how much upload bandwidth is available to it. Performing this test requires briefly removing the throttle. Value in ms.

CustomSetting.Name: HTTP Connection Request Timeout
CustomSetting.Description: The timeout value for HTTP connection requests. The WinHttp default is 60 seconds. DN default is also 60 seconds.

CustomSetting.Name: HTTP Name Resolution Timeout
CustomSetting.Description: The timeout value for HTTP name resolution. The WinHttp default is 0 seconds, no timeout (infinite). DN default is also 0.

CustomSetting.Name: HTTP Receive Response Timeout
CustomSetting.Description: The timeout value for receiving HTTP response to requests. The WinHttp default is 30 seconds. DN default is 60 seconds.

CustomSetting.Name: HTTP Send Request Timeout
CustomSetting.Description: The timeout value for HTTP send requests. The WinHttp default is 30 seconds. DN default is 60 seconds.

CustomSetting.Name: Disable Default File Exclusions
CustomSetting.Description: Allows you to override the default file exclusions and specify your own under the FileExclusions key.

CustomSetting.Name: Disable Default Folder Exclusions
CustomSetting.Description: Allows you to override the default folder exclusions and specify your own under the FolderExclusions key.

CustomSetting.Name: Cache Expiry Time
CustomSetting.Description: Overrides the default cache expiry time for a folder listing. Value in ms.

CustomSetting.Name: Failed Upload Retry Time Max
CustomSetting.Description: Maximum number milliseconds to wait before retrying failed uploads.

CustomSetting.Name: Failed Upload Retry Time Min
CustomSetting.Description: The minimum time in milliseconds after an upload fails before it's retried (it won't be retried if the network is unavailable).

CustomSetting.Name: Offline Mappoint Timeout
CustomSetting.Description: Map-point timeout value passed to the appliance. If a map-point fails to respond within this time, it appears offline. Value is in seconds.

CustomSetting.Name: Recycle Server Side Deletions
CustomSetting.Description: If set, this will cause DataNow to reflect any server side deletions by sending local files to the recycle bin.

CustomSetting.Name: Logon Token Wait Period
CustomSetting.Description: The time at logon that DataNow will wait for the session token, polling WTSQueryUserToken. Value is in seconds.

CustomSetting.Name: Session Startup Wait Time
CustomSetting.Description: The length of time the service will wait calling WTSQueryUserToken while trying to initialize a user after win logon. Value is in seconds.

CustomSetting.Name: Enable Single Sign On
CustomSetting.Description: Enables SSO for the workstation.
